infos.value: There is no mistaking that you can become stronger more quickly by working together with your fellow guild members.

• Guild Statues •
Here, you can enhance your Guild Statues and confirm their effects.

• Guild Statues •
These statues bestow unit stat boosts on all units possessed by the guild members.

• Enhancing Guild Statues •
Guild Statues can be enhanced with special items, gil, and Visiore.

• Guild Statue Effects •
The effects of the Guild Statues can be confirmed via the Unlocked Effects List.
Proceed to a tutorial on Guild Statues?
